name: Ideias e Imagens
overview:
Ideias e Imagens is the leading user experience consultancy in Portugal. Apart from providing all sorts of user research, analysis, interaction design, information architecture and usability testing services, we also produce the largest UX event in Europe, UXLx: User Experience Lisbon: www.ux-lx.com

Services:

User Research: we conduct focus groups, contextual interviews, diary studies and more.

Quantitative and Qualitative analysis: we run questionnaires and provide insights from research.

Usability Testing: we evaluate interfaces with real users in our own usability testing lab.

Heuristic Evaluations: expert reviews of interfaces matched to international best practices and research and our own +10 years of experience.

Competitive Analysis: we evaluate your product against your competitors and show you all the best practices in the field.

Prototyping: from low to high fidelity prototypes, we provide quick iterations of user interfaces for further testing.

Accessibility Evaluations: we analyze how accessible is your interface and provide recommendations.
